Translations.Text: na to ko'i koma potana samayathi agala vadhi ane na to pachala rahi ga'i

pachi ame eka-pachi eka payagambarone avatarita karata rahya, jyare pana je koma pase temana payagambara avya, temane juthalavya, basa! Ame ekane bija pachala lagavi didha ane te lokone navalakatha banavi didha. Te loko mate duri che, je'o imana nathi lavata
Pachi ame musa a.Sa. Ane temana bha'i haruna a.Sa.Ne potani ayato ane spasta purava sathe avatarita karya
phira'auna ane tena laskaro tarapha, basa! Te loko'e ghamanda karyum ane te loko vidrohi ja hatam
kaheva lagya ke sum ame apana jeva be vyakti'o para imana lavi'e? Jo ke temani koma pote (pana) amari dekharekha hethala che
basa! Te loko'e te bannene juthalavya, chevate te loko pana nasta thayela'o manthi tha'i gaya
ame musa a.Sa.Ne kitaba pana api, jethi loko satya marga para avi jaya
ame marayamana dikara ane teni matane eka nisani banavya ane te bannene ucca, svaccha ane raheva layaka, ane vaheta panivali jagya para sarana apyum
he payagambaro! Halala vastu kha'o ane satkarya karo, tame je kami pana kari rahya cho tene hum sari rite janum chum
ni:Sanka a tamaro dina eka ja dina che ane hum ja tamara sauno palanahara chum, basa! Tame marathi darata raho
pachi te loko'e pote (ja) potana adesa (dina)na andaro'andara tukade tukada kari didha, dareka jutha je kami temani pase che, tena para ja itara'i rahyo che
basa! Tame (pana) temane vidroha mate thodoka samaya api do
sum a loko ema samaji betha che ke ame je kami pana temanum dhana ane santanamam vadharo kari rahya che, (te temane phayado pahoncadase)
te'o potana mate bhala'i'omam utavala kari rahya che, (nahim) parantu a loko samajata ja nathi
ni:Sanka je loko potana palanaharana gus'sathi dare che
ane je potana palanaharani ayato para imana dharave che
ane je loko potana palanahara sathe ko'ine bhagidara nathi banavata
